description: The Tampa Bay Rays have hired Kevin Cash as the fifth manager in franchise history, it was announced Friday.
creator: ESPN.com news services
title: 'Dynamic' Cash gets call as Rays manager

description: The Yankees acquire shortstop Didi Gregorius in three-team trade with the Diamondbacks and Tigers.
creator: Andrew Marchand
title: Yanks acquire Gregorius in 3-team trade

description: Free-agent reliever Andrew Miller remains employed in the AL East after reaching agreement on a contract with the Yankees on Friday.
creator: Wallace Matthews
title: Yanks add LHP Miller for 4 years, $36 million

description: Veteran pitcher Ryan Dempster retired as a member of the Chicago Cubs and will stay on with the team's front office, it was announced Friday.
creator: Jesse Rogers
title: Dempster retires, joins Cubs front office

description: Washington Nationals outfielder Jayson Werth has been convicted of reckless driving and sentenced to 10 days in jail for driving over 100 miles per hour on the Capital Beltway.
creator: Associated Press
title: Werth gets 10 days in jail for reckless driving

description: After being the odd man out in the outfield for the second half of last season, Andre Ethier has let the Los Angeles Dodgers know that he wants to play every day.
creator: ESPN.com news services
title: OF Ethier to Dodgers: Play me every day

description: Royals right-hander Luke Hochevar hopes to begin throwing off a mound later this month as he continues to rehab from Tommy John surgery that caused him to miss all of last season.
creator: Associated Press
title: Royals' Hochevar to throw off mound soon

description: Had things come together last season, Nelson Cruz's introduction with the Seattle Mariners would have taken place a year ago.
creator: Associated Press
title: Mariners, Cruz make 4-year deal official

description: Daisuke Matsuzaka has signed a contract with the Softbank Hawks of Japan's Pacific League after eight years in Major League Baseball.
creator: ESPN.com news services
title: 8 years, 56 wins later, Dice-K back to Japan

description: Former Cubs outfielder and Tampa Bay Rays bench coach Dave Martinez will resume the same role under new manager Joe Maddon, the team announced Thursday.
creator: Jesse Rogers
title: Maddon hires Martinez as Cubs bench coach

description: The Rangers retained one of the mainstays of their starting rotation by signing Colby Lewis to a one-year, $4 million deal Thursday.
creator: Calvin Watkins
title: Rangers hold on to Lewis with 1-year deal

description: Torii Hunter scolded a beat reporter in a news conference Wednesday in which the newly signed outfielder was introduced by the Minnesota Twins, calling the journalist a derogatory word four times near the end of the media session in Minneapolis.
creator: ESPN.com news services
title: Hunter, in Twins intro, berates beat reporter

description: Michael Saunders says he used to daydream about playing for the Toronto Blue Jays.
creator: Associated Press
title: Canadian Saunders 'honored' to join Jays

description: Incoming Major League Baseball commissioner Rob Manfred has reorganized several top jobs in the sport.
creator: Associated Press
title: Incoming commissioner reorganizes top jobs

description: Award-winning columnist Bryan Burwell of the St. Louis Post-Dispatch died Thursday after a brief battle with cancer. He was 59.
creator: ESPN.com news services
title: Sports columnist Bryan Burwell dies at 59

description: Australian Open organizers have tweaked the extreme heat policy for 2015 in the wake of complaints from players about dangerous conditions during a heat wave in Melbourne during the last tournament.
creator: Associated Press
title: Australian Open officials tweak heat policy

description: Austrian tennis player Yvonne Meusburger is coming out of retirement to play one more tournament -- the Australian Open in January.
creator: Associated Press
title: Retired Meusburger to return for Aussie Open

description: Serena Williams made a much-awaited appearance at the franchise-based International Premier Tennis League on Sunday but could not lift Singapore Slammers as the team succumbed to a third straight defeat in the first leg.
creator: Associated Press
title: Serena has 'fun' at IPTL event despite losing

description: Andy Murray is to marry long-time girlfriend Kim Sears.
creator: Associated Press
title: Murray engaged to marry longtime girlfriend

description: A French chair umpire on the futures and challenger tours became the first official to be suspended for corruption by the Tennis Integrity Unit when he received a life ban on Tuesday.
creator: Associated Press
title: French tennis federation official banned for life

description: Roger Federer defeated Richard Gasquet 6-4, 6-2, 6-2 in the first reverse singles match Sunday as Switzerland won the Davis Cup final against France by taking an unassailable 3-1 lead.
creator: Associated Press
title: First for Federer as Swiss win Davis Cup

description: Rafael Nadal criticized Spain's female Davis Cup captain on Tuesday for feeding a "false and absurd" debate that started when his coach and uncle questioned whether a woman could coach in the men's game.
creator: Associated Press
title: Nadal criticizes captain for 'false' debate

description: Rafael Nadal says he will return to playing at the start of the year.
creator: Associated Press
title: Nadal says he'll return to action in January

description: Roger Federer has pulled out of the ATP Finals less than one hour before his title match with Novak Djokovic, handing a third consecutive title to the top-ranked Serb.
creator: Associated Press
title: Federer withdraws, cedes ATP title to Djoker

description: Top-ranked Bob and Mike Bryan claimed their fourth doubles title at the ATP Finals with a 6-7 (5), 6-2, 10-7 win over seventh-seeded Ivan Dodig and Marcelo Melo on Sunday.
creator: Associated Press
title: Bryans win their fourth ATP Finals doubles title

description: Serena Williams will hold a run on South Beach next month for runners of all ages and abilities to support her foundation.
creator: Associated Press
title: Serena to host South Beach charitable run

description: The Czech Republic claimed its third Fed Cup title in four years after Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova had to fight hard to overcome Angelique Kerber of Germany in the opening reverse singles match on Sunday.
creator: Associated Press

description: American tennis pro Melanie Oudin is home after a procedure for a heart condition.
creator: Associated Press
title: Oudin returns home after heart procedure

description: Fourth-ranked Simona Halep has parted ways with coach Wim Fissette after less than a year.
creator: Associated Press
title: Halep dismisses coach after less than a year

description: Roger Federer, Andy Murray and the Bryan brothers are among the winners of the ATP World Tour Awards.
creator: Associated Press
title: Federer, Murray, Bryans win ATP awards

description: Battling a fever, persistent cough and nausea, Tiger Woods shot his best round of the Hero World Challenge on Saturday, but was still unable to pull himself out of last place in the elite 18-player field.

title: Visibly ill Tiger vomits during 3rd-round play

description: Jordan Spieth rolled in a 50-foot birdie putt on the last hole to cap off a Saturday at Isleworth that was close to perfect.

description: Tiger Woods' former coach, Hank Haney, feels the former world No. 1 is headed in the right direction with his swing, even after shooting rounds of 77 and 70 during the first two days of the Hero World Challenge in Windermere, Florida.

creator: Associated Press

description: Fresh off her $1.5 million payoff at the CME Group Tour Championship, Lydia Ko received even better news. She has been accepted into the Korea University, one of the top colleges in Seoul.

description: Tiger Woods' sponsorship deal with Hero MotoCorp is his biggest new endorsement contract in five years and is expected to pay the golfer $6 million to $8 million annually.

description: Tiger Woods went back to his very successful past to try to forge a path to the future.

description: Robin Burke has been selected as U.S. captain for the Curtis Cup in 2016.

description: Jordan Spieth made his first trip Down Under a successful one and shot an 8-under 63 on Sunday to win the Australian Open by 6 strokes.

creator: Brian Campbell
